figureSubheading1: With SNARK verification of 100+ epoch headers, instantaneously
figureSubheading2: A 17,000x reduction in the lightclient data to download with epoch-based synching, and 10x reduction thanks to BLS aggregation
figureSubheading3: A multi-party computation for cutting-edge cryptography
mainBody1: The SNARK to be secured by the Espero Ceremony for Plumo is one of the most complex yet powerful SNARKs to ever be secured. The outcome can be used not only by cLabs & the Plumo construction, but also by any project that uses the BW6 curve with the Groth16 proving system or any other based on polynomial commitments. By participating in this Ceremony, participants can be part of something that is a public good, and will hopefully be used to power many more systems to come.
